rationale: No intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifies a risk-adjective.
The segment reports detection and planned euthanasia using neutral verbs.
The segment mentions cases being 'detected' and birds 'were set to be euthanized' (a plan), neither fitting the Q3 pattern.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports recent cases and planned euthanasia, lacking explicit calming language.
The segment does not contain a minimiser combined with a scale contrast. 'just days' refers to time, not scale/quantity of the threat.
The segment reports detection of cases and planned euthanasia, not capabilities or preparedness.
The segment reports the number of chickens (570,000) set to be euthanized, a numerical metric, using standard descriptive language.
